channel.description: Recent content in SQL Translation on Sakthi Priyan H

item.title: Building SQL Translator using AI Coding Agents
item.description: A comprehensive walkthrough of building an extensible SQL translator framework using AI coding agents, ANTLR grammars, unified IR and YAML-driven testing.

item.title: Building SQL Translator using AI Coding Agents
item.description: A walkthrough of building a SQL translator using agentic AI, deterministic ANTLR grammars, unified IR, and YAML-driven testing.
